column5: On my way to work this morning and the boss lady calls me on my cell just as I'm getting off the highway in Cobourg.  She hasn't been feeling well for a couple weeks.  She found out after I left for work that we are expecting our second child. I have been trying to convince her for the longest time that for our second kid we should wait to find out if its a boy or girl untill the baby is born, she finally relented a couple months ago.  Just in time. Hmm I wonder if they frown on a guy taking parental leave and fishing all summer???

Hey congrates to you and the missus for becoming so to be new parents the 2nd time around..  AS for taking the parental leave, I passed the idea along on my wife once. Lets just say I had to replace a couple of fishing rods.

What fantastic news.  Congratulations.  Well I waited for my son to be born before I knew if he was a boy or girl and I don't think I would have wanted it any other way, but back then, nobody ever checked to see what they were having.  It kind of makes it all the more fun!!  Joey
Congrats Verno. All the best to the growing family
Congrats Verno, never hurts to add another fishing partner...  Maureen
Great news Verno, congrats to your whole family !!
wooohoo congrats on the second Verno!!!!! i'..they rock!!!  UF
The greatest present you could have.
congrats,verno a very nice xmas present
